description:
Unlock the ultimate in drivetrain cleaning with this high-strength foaming drivetrain degreaser. Tough on grime, yet gentle on your bike and the environment.

  • Carefully balanced formula removes grime without damaging your bike's finish
  • Dual-function foam nozzle with mist and foam modes to get into those hard-to-reach areas
  • Foam application increases contact time, ensuring effective removal of grease and grime, including chain lube
  • Carbon-fibre-safe
name: Peaty's Foaming Drivetrain Degreaser 1L
